alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Pulaski; Wythe (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:42PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PULASKI AND NORTHEASTERN WYTHE COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF RADFORD THROUGH 115 PM EDT... At 1241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pulaski to near Grahams Forge. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Radford... Pulaski... Dublin... Allisonia... Patterson... Claytor Dam... and Fairlawn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
